trans-unit.source: the Taiwan calendar.
trans-unit.target: 台灣曆法。

trans-unit.source: The Taiwan calendar works exactly like the Gregorian calendar, except that the year and era are different.
trans-unit.target: 台灣曆法運作方式完全一樣西曆，除了年份和紀元不同。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar> class recognizes only the current era.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar>類別會辨識目前的紀元。

trans-unit.source: For information about using the <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar> class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar>類別和其他的行事曆 .NET Framework 中的類別，請參閱[使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。

trans-unit.source: Leap years in the Taiwan calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在台灣曆法閏年與相同潤年西曆。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 閏年西曆中定義為整除西曆年份中，由四個，除非它是整除 100。

trans-unit.source: However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 不過，400 所整除西曆年份是潤年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: The Taiwan calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each:
trans-unit.target: 台灣曆法具有 12 個月有 28 到 31 天每個：

trans-unit.source: GetMonth value
trans-unit.target: GetMonth 值

trans-unit.source: Month
trans-unit.target: 月份

trans-unit.source: Days in common years
trans-unit.target: 常見的年數天

trans-unit.source: Days in leap years
trans-unit.target: 閏年的天數

trans-unit.source: 1月 (January)
trans-unit.target: 1 月 （一月）

trans-unit.source: 2月 (February)
trans-unit.target: 2 月 （二月）

trans-unit.source: 3月 (March)
trans-unit.target: 3 月 （年 3 月）

trans-unit.source: 4月 (April)
trans-unit.target: 4 月 （四月）

trans-unit.source: 5月 (May)
trans-unit.target: 5月 （月）

trans-unit.source: 6月 (June)
trans-unit.target: 6月 （年 6 月）

trans-unit.source: 7月 (July)
trans-unit.target: 7月 （年 7 月）

trans-unit.source: 8月 (August)
9月 (September)
trans-unit.target: 9月 （年 9 月）

trans-unit.source: 10月 (October)
trans-unit.target: 10 月 （十月）

trans-unit.source: 11月 (November)
12月 (December)
trans-unit.target: 12 月 （十二月）

trans-unit.source: February has 29 days during leap years and 28 during common years.
trans-unit.target: 二月有 29 天，閏年和 28。

trans-unit.source: The date January 1, 2001 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 日期 2001 年 1 月 1 日西元

trans-unit.source: in the Gregorian calendar is equivalent to the first day of January in the year 90 of the current era in the Taiwan calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在西曆中就相當於 90 目前紀元台灣曆法的年 1 月的第一天。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> supports a set of calendars.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>支援一組的行事曆。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A> property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A> property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A>屬性會傳回預設的行事曆文化特性，而<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A>屬性會傳回陣列，其中包含所有支援的文化特性的行事曆。

trans-unit.source: To change the calendar used by a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>, the application should set the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to a new <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更所使用的行事曆<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>，應用程式應該設定<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>屬性<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>至新<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar" /> is the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" /> but the <see cref="P:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture" /> is not "zh-TW", then <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.NativeCalendarName" />, <see cref="M:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEraName(System.Int32)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAbbreviatedEraName(System.Int32)" /> return an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果<see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar" />是<see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" />但<see cref="P:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture" />不是"ZH-TW"，然後<see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.NativeCalendarName" />， <see cref="M:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEraName(System.Int32)" />，和<see cref="M:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAbbreviatedEraName(System.Int32)" />傳回空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Unable to initialize a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" /> object because of missing culture information.
trans-unit.target: 由於缺少文化特性資訊，無法初始化 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to which to add months.
trans-unit.target: 要將月份加入的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of months to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的月數。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that is the specified number of months away from the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 相差指定月數的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，由將指定的月數加入指定的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 所產生。

trans-unit.source: The day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 產生的日期部分<xref:System.DateTime>如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。

trans-unit.source: It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 它會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。

trans-unit.source: The year part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 產生的年份部分<xref:System.DateTime>如果產生的月份超出指定的年份，會影響<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports only the current era.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作支援目前的紀元。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會擲回<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: The time-of-day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> remains the same as the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 產生的日期時間部分<xref:System.DateTime>維持不變，與指定<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in April.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果指定的月份是 10 月 31 天內，其指定的日期，而且該月第 31 天的值`months`參數為 6，產生的年份是其中一個以上的指定年份中，產生的月份是年 4 月，並產生 day 是第 30 天、 4 月的最後一天。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is earlier than the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`months`參數是負值，產生<xref:System.DateTime>早於指定<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value always equals <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>值一律等於<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You can preserve the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` parameter by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保留<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數<xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.AddMonths%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.AddMonths%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> is outside the supported range.
trans-unit.target: 產生的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 在支援的範圍之外。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="months" /> is less than -120000.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="months" /> 小於 -120000。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="months" /> is greater than 120000.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="months" /> 大於 120000。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to which to add years.
trans-unit.target: 要將年份加入的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of years to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的年數。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that is the specified number of years away from the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 相差指定年數的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that results from adding the specified number of years to the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，由將指定的年數加入指定的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 所產生。

trans-unit.source: The day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 產生的日期部分<xref:System.DateTime>如果產生的日期不是有效的日期，產生結果年的月份中會受到影響。

trans-unit.source: It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 它會變更為有效的最後一天，在產生的產生的年份。

trans-unit.source: The month part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> remains the same as the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 產生的月份部分<xref:System.DateTime>維持不變，與指定<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports only the current era.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作支援目前的紀元。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果產生的年份超出指定紀元，會擲回<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: The time-of-day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> remains the same as the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 產生的日期時間部分<xref:System.DateTime>維持不變，與指定<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days.
trans-unit.target: 例如，二月有 28 天，除了閏年時有 29 天期間。

trans-unit.source: If the specified date is the 29th day of February in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date is the 28th day of February in the following year.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的日期是潤年 2 月 29 日值`years`為 1，則產生的日期是一年中的 2 月 28 日。

trans-unit.source: If `years` is negative, the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is earlier than the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`years`是負數，產生<xref:System.DateTime>早於指定<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value always equals <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.DateTime>值一律等於<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You can preserve the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` parameter by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保留<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數<xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the use of the <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.AddYears%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示使用<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.AddYears%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> is outside the supported range.
trans-unit.target: 產生的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 在支援的範圍之外。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current calendar is solar-based, lunar-based, or a combination of both.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前的月曆是以陽曆為主、以陰曆為主，還是同時包含兩種曆法。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType.SolarCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType.SolarCalendar" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses reflection to instantiate each <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar> type found in the .NET Framework and displays the value of its <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.AlgorithmType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用反映來具現化每個<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>位於.NET Framework 型別，並顯示的值及其<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.AlgorithmType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of eras in the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" /> 中的紀元清單。

trans-unit.source: An array that consists of a single element for which the value is always the current era.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，由值永遠為目前紀元的單一元素組成。

trans-unit.source: The values in the array returned by this property are numbers that range from 1 to the largest era number.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性所傳回陣列中的值會是範圍從 1 到最大的紀元數的數字。

trans-unit.source: The largest era number is returned in the first array element and the smallest era number is returned in the last element.
trans-unit.target: 第一個陣列元素中傳回的最大數的紀元和紀元小數會傳回最後一個項目中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the day of the month in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中月份的日期。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day of the month in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 1 到 31 的整數，表示指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中月份的日期。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDayOfMonth%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDayOfMonth%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the day of the week in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的星期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DayOfWeek" /> value that represents the day of the week in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DayOfWeek" /> 值，表示指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的星期。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DayOfWeek> values are as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DayOfWeek>值如下：

trans-unit.source: DayOfWeek value
trans-unit.target: DayOfWeek 值

trans-unit.source: which indicates
trans-unit.target: 表示

trans-unit.source: Sunday
trans-unit.target: 星期日

trans-unit.source: 星期日
trans-unit.target: 星期日

trans-unit.source: Monday
trans-unit.target: 週一

trans-unit.source: 星期一
trans-unit.target: 星期一

trans-unit.source: Tuesday
trans-unit.target: 星期二

trans-unit.source: 星期二
trans-unit.target: 星期二

trans-unit.source: Wednesday
trans-unit.target: 週三

trans-unit.source: 星期三
trans-unit.target: 星期三

trans-unit.source: Thursday
trans-unit.target: 星期四

trans-unit.source: 星期四
trans-unit.target: 星期四

trans-unit.source: Friday
trans-unit.target: 星期五

trans-unit.source: 星期五
trans-unit.target: 星期五

trans-unit.source: Saturday
trans-unit.target: 星期六

trans-unit.source: 星期六
trans-unit.target: 星期六

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDayOfWeek%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDayOfWeek%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the day of the year in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中一年中的日期。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 366 that represents the day of the year in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 1 到 366 的整數，表示指定之 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的年份日期。

trans-unit.source: The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year.
trans-unit.target: 年份的日期被定義為一年的第一天中的天數。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDayOfYear%2A> for the first day of the first month returns 1, and <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDayOfYear%2A> for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDayOfYear%2A>的第一個月的第一天，則傳回 1，和<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDayOfYear%2A>日期在過去一個月，最後該年份中傳回總天數。

trans-unit.source: The total is the same as the value returned by <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDaysInYear%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 總計是所傳回的值相同<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDaysInYear%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDayOfYear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDayOfYear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 表示年份的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 從 1 到 12 的整數，表示月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 表示紀元的整數。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of days in the specified month in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在指定紀元的指定年份的指定月份中的日數。

trans-unit.source: The number of days in the specified month in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 在指定紀元的指定年份的指定月份中的日數。

trans-unit.source: For example, this method returns 28 or 29 for February (`month` = 2), depending on whether `year` is a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 例如，這個方法會傳回 28 或 29 表示二月 (`month` = 2)，取決於是否`year`是否為閏年。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDaysInMonth%2A> for the second month in each of five years in each era.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDaysInMonth%2A>每五年的每個紀元中的第二個月份。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="month" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="month" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 表示年份的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 表示紀元的整數。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of days in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在指定紀元的指定年份中的日數。

trans-unit.source: The number of days in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 在指定紀元的指定年份中的日數。

trans-unit.source: For example, this method returns 365 or 366, depending on whether `year` is a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 例如，這個方法會傳回 365 或 366，取決於是否`year`是否為閏年。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDaysInYear%2A> for five years in each era.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetDaysInYear%2A>五年的每個紀元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the era in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的紀元。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的紀元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar> class recognizes only the current era.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar>類別會辨識目前的紀元。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetEra%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetEra%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A year.
trans-unit.target: 一年。

trans-unit.source: An era.
trans-unit.target: 一紀元。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.
trans-unit.target: 計算指定年份和紀元的閏月。

trans-unit.source: The return value is always 0 because the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" /> class does not support the notion of a leap month.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值永遠都會是 0，因為 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" /> 類別不支援閏月的概念。

trans-unit.source: In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year.
trans-unit.target: 曆法，支援閏月的概念，在特定月份或任何一年中月份之後發生的閏月。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%2A> method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%2A>方法傳回的數字，介於 1 到 13，表示相關聯的指定日期的月份。

trans-unit.source: If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the <xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%2A> method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.
trans-unit.target: 如果年份的第八個和第九個月之間沒有閏月<xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%2A>方法會傳回 8 閏第八個月的 9 和 10 的第九個月份的第八個月份。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the month in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 1 到 12 的整數，表示指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的月份。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetMonth%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetMonth%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 表示年份的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 表示紀元的整數。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of months in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在指定紀元的指定年份中的月數。

trans-unit.source: The number of months in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 在指定紀元的指定年份中的月數。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetMonthsInYear%2A> for five years in each era.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetMonthsInYear%2A>五年的每個紀元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule" /> values that defines a calendar week.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule" /> 值，可定義行事曆週。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DayOfWeek" /> values that represents the first day of the week.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DayOfWeek" /> 值，表示一週的第一天。

trans-unit.source: Returns the week of the year that includes the date in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回年份中的週，包含指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的日期。

trans-unit.source: A positive integer that represents the week of the year that includes the date in the <paramref name="time" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 正整數，表示 <paramref name="time" /> 參數中日期所屬年份中的某週。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to determine the number of weeks in the year by setting the `time` parameter to the last day of the year.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可用來判斷一年的週數藉由設定`time`一年的最後一天的參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property contains culture-specific values that can be used for the `rule` and `firstDayOfWeek` parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性包含的特定文化特性的值，可用於`rule`和`firstDayOfWeek`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek%2A> property of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> contains the default <xref:System.DayOfWeek> value that represents the first day of the week for a specific culture, using the calendar specified in the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>屬性<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>包含預設<xref:System.DayOfWeek>值，表示使用行事曆中指定特定文化特性之當週的第一天<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>屬性<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CalendarWeekRule%2A> property of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> contains the default <xref:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule> value that defines a calendar week for a specific culture, using the calendar specified in the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CalendarWeekRule%2A>屬性<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>包含預設<xref:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule>值，定義特定文化特性，使用中指定的行事曆日曆週<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>屬性<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For example, in <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>, the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear%2A> method for January 1 returns 1.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>、<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear%2A>年 1 月 1 方法會傳回 1。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how the result of <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear%2A> varies depending on the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule> values used.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear%2A>而有所不同，取決於<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule>用的值。

trans-unit.source: If the specified date is the last day of the year, <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear%2A> returns the total number of weeks in that year.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的日期的年份，最後一天<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear%2A>傳回該年份的週數總計。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="time" /> or <paramref name="firstDayOfWeek" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="time" /> 或 <paramref name="firstDayOfWeek" /> 在日曆支援的範圍之外。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="rule" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rule" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the year in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的年份。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetYear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.GetYear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 表示年份的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 從 1 到 12 的整數，表示月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day.
trans-unit.target: 從 1 到 31 的整數，表示日期。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 表示紀元的整數。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定紀元中指定的日期是否為閏日。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的日期為閏日，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Leap years in the Taiwan calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在台灣曆法閏年與相同潤年西曆。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 閏年西曆中定義為整除西曆年份中，由四個，除非它是整除 100。

trans-unit.source: However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 不過，400 所整除西曆年份是潤年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 為閏日是閏年只會發生一天。

trans-unit.source: For example, the 29th day of February is the only leap day.
trans-unit.target: 例如，年 2 月 29 日是唯一的閏日。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapDay%2A> for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapDay%2A>的第二個月 （二月） 五年的每個紀元的最後一天。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="month" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="month" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="day" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="day" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 表示年份的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 從 1 到 12 的整數，表示月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 表示紀元的整數。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified month in the specified year in the specified era is a leap month.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定紀元的指定年份中指定的月份是否為閏月。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns <see langword="false" />, unless overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法永遠傳回 <see langword="false" />，除非被衍生類別 (Derived Class) 所覆寫。

trans-unit.source: Leap years in the Taiwan calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在台灣曆法閏年與相同潤年西曆。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 閏年西曆中定義為整除西曆年份中，由四個，除非它是整除 100。

trans-unit.source: However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 不過，400 所整除西曆年份是潤年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 為閏月是只發生在閏年整個月。

trans-unit.source: The Taiwan calendar does not have any leap months.
trans-unit.target: 台灣曆法，並沒有任何閏月。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapMonth%2A> for all the months in five years in the current era.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapMonth%2A>目前紀元中的五年中的所有月份。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="month" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="month" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 表示年份的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 表示紀元的整數。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified year in the specified era is a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定紀元中指定的年份是否為閏年。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified year is a leap year; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的年份為閏年，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Leap years in the Taiwan calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在台灣曆法閏年與相同潤年西曆。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 閏年西曆中定義為整除西曆年份中，由四個，除非它是整除 100。

trans-unit.source: However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 不過，400 所整除西曆年份是潤年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 一般年份有 365 天，閏年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapYear%2A> for five years in each of the eras.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.IsLeapYear%2A>五年的每個紀元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Gets the latest date and time supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" /> 類別所支援的最晚日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The latest date and time supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" /> class, which is equivalent to the last moment of December 31, 9999 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 最晚的日期和時間所支援<see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" />類別，這就相當於最後一刻的年 12 月 31 日到 9999 年

trans-unit.source: in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 西曆。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會取得的最小值和行事曆的最大值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the earliest date and time supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" /> 類別所支援的最早日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The earliest date and time supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" /> class, which is equivalent to the first moment of January 1, 1912 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 最早日期和時間所支援<see cref="T:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar" />類別，這就相當於 1912 年 1 月 1，西元第一個快照

trans-unit.source: in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 西曆。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Visual Basic represents time of day as the specified time on the minimum date supported by <xref:System.DateTime>, which is January 1, 0001 C.E.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Visual Basic 中表示為所支援的最小日期的指定時間的時間<xref:System.DateTime>，這是公元 0001 年 1 月 1 日

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar> class does not support that minimum date.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar>類別不支援的最小日期。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, if your application calls a method to format the time of day using the current calendar but does not specify a format specifier, formatting uses the ISO 8601 sortable ("s") date/time pattern format specifier instead of the default general ("G") date/time pattern format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果您的應用程式呼叫方法以設定使用現行曆法的日期時間的格式，但不是指定格式規範，格式會使用 ISO 8601 可排序 ("s") 的日期/時間模式的格式規範而非預設的一般 ("G") 日期 /時間模式的格式規範。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會取得的最小值和行事曆的最大值。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 表示年份的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 從 1 到 12 的整數，表示月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day.
trans-unit.target: 從 1 到 31 的整數，表示日期。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 23 that represents the hour.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 23 的整數，表示小時。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 59 that represents the minute.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 59 的整數，表示分鐘。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 59 that represents the second.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 59 的整數，表示秒鐘。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 999 that represents the millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 999 的整數，表示毫秒。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 表示紀元的整數。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that is set to the specified date and time in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在指定紀元中設定為指定日期和時間的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that is set to the specified date and time in the current era.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，設定為目前紀元中指定的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="month" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="month" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="day" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="day" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="hour" /> is less than zero or greater than 23.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hour" /> 小於 0 或大於 23。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="minute" /> is less than zero or greater than 59.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="minute" /> 小於 0 或大於 59。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="second" /> is less than zero or greater than 59.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="second" /> 小於 0 或大於 59。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="millisecond" /> is less than zero or greater than 999.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="millisecond" /> 小於 0 或大於 999。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.
trans-unit.target: 兩位數或四位數整數，代表要轉換的年份。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax" /> property to determine the appropriate century.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的年份轉換為 4 位數年份，方法是使用 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax" /> 屬性以判斷適當的世紀。

trans-unit.source: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of <paramref name="year" />.
trans-unit.target: 整數，包含 <paramref name="year" /> 的四位數表示。

trans-unit.source: This method implements <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會實作 <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Because the year in the Taiwan calendar is typically less than four digits long, this implementation always returns the value of the `year` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因為在台灣曆法的年份通常少於四個位數，這個實作一律會傳回的值`year`參數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A> supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A> 支援兩位數年份或四位數年份。

trans-unit.source: Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A> value representing the appropriate century.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞的兩位數年份值 (小於 100) 將使這個方法將值轉換為四位數的值根據<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>值，表示該適當世紀。

trans-unit.source: If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A>, the method returns the actual input value.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍內的四位數年份值<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A>，方法會傳回實際的輸入的值。

trans-unit.source: If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍四位數值或它提供一個負數值，方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 不在曆法支援的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

trans-unit.source: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

trans-unit.source: This property implements <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會實作 <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Because the year in the Taiwan calendar is typically less than four digits long, this implementation returns 99 by default and does not affect the return value of <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在台灣日曆年度通常少於四個位數，此實作中預設會傳回 99，因為不會影響傳回值<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.
trans-unit.target: 在設定作業中指定的值小於 99。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The value specified in a set operation is greater than <see langword="MaxSupportedDateTime.Year" />.
trans-unit.target: 在設定作業中指定的值大於 <see langword="MaxSupportedDateTime.Year" />。

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 在設定作業中，目前執行個體是唯讀的。
